languages.text: {n}Губернатор осматривает Абеляра с ног до головы и отвечает с едва заметным сомнением.{/n} "На это указывают определенные доказательства, Абеляр... уверен, {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость вынесет справедливое решение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор осматривает Абеляра с ног до головы и отвечает с едва заметным сомнением.{/n} "На это указывают доказательства... В конце концов, ваш род — не вы сами, Абеляр".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}The governor sweeps his gaze over Abelard, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice:{/n} "We have evidence implicating them, Abelard... I am sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will arrive at a fair ruling."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор осматривает Абеляра с ног до головы и отвечает с едва заметным сомнением.{/n} "На это указывают определенные доказательства, Абеляр... уверен, {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость вынесет справедливое решение".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Governor examines Abelard from head to toe, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice.{/n} "Certain evidence points to them, Abelard... I'm sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will pass a just sentence."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}The Governor examines Abelard from head to toe, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice.{/n} "Certain evidence points to them, Abelard... I'm sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will pass a just sentence."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor sweeps his gaze over Abelard, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice:{/n} "We have evidence implicating them, Abelard... I am sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will arrive at a fair ruling."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}総督はアベラルドを頭から爪先までつぶさに観察してから、疑念というかすかな影を含んだ声色で返答する。{/n}「確かな証拠が奴らだと示しているのだ、アベラルド…陛下は間違いなく公平な裁定を下してくださる」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor sweeps his gaze over Abelard, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice:{/n} "We have evidence implicating them, Abelard... I am sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will arrive at a fair ruling."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督はアベラルドを頭から爪先までつぶさに観察してから、疑念というかすかな影を含んだ声色で返答する。{/n}「確かな証拠が奴らだと示しているのだ、アベラルド…陛下は間違いなく公平な裁定を下してくださる」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}厄本的目光扫过了阿贝拉德。当他再次开口时，他的声音中仍带着一丝怀疑。{/n}“我们有证据表明他们牵连其中，阿贝拉德……我相信，大人会做出明智的判断。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor sweeps his gaze over Abelard, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice:{/n} "We have evidence implicating them, Abelard... I am sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will arrive at a fair ruling."

traits.locale_text: {n}厄本的目光扫过了阿贝拉德。当他再次开口时，他的声音中仍带着一丝怀疑。{/n}“我们有证据表明他们牵连其中，阿贝拉德……我相信，大人会做出明智的判断。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur jette un regard à Abélard avant de répondre avec circonspection :{/n} « Nous avons des preuves de leur implication, Abélard... Je suis certain que le jugement de Sa Seigneurie sera impartial. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor sweeps his gaze over Abelard, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice:{/n} "We have evidence implicating them, Abelard... I am sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will arrive at a fair ruling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur jette un regard à Abélard avant de répondre avec circonspection :{/n} « Nous avons des preuves de leur implication, Abélard... Je suis certain que le jugement de Sa Seigneurie sera impartial. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}El gobernador recorre a Abelard de arriba a abajo con la mirada y luego responde con un atisbo de duda en su voz.{/n} «Tenemos pruebas que llevan hasta ellos, Abelard... Seguro que mi{mf|lord|lady} tomará una decisión justa».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor sweeps his gaze over Abelard, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice:{/n} "We have evidence implicating them, Abelard... I am sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will arrive at a fair ruling."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador recorre a Abelard de arriba a abajo con la mirada y luego responde con un atisbo de duda en su voz.{/n} «Tenemos pruebas que llevan hasta ellos, Abelard... Seguro que mi{mf|lord|lady} tomará una decisión justa».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur mustert Abelard und antwortet dann mit einem Hauch von Skepsis in der Stimme:{/n} "Wir haben Beweise für ihre Beteiligung, Abelard ... Ich bin sicher {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} wird eine gerechte Entscheidung treffen."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor sweeps his gaze over Abelard, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice:{/n} "We have evidence implicating them, Abelard... I am sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will arrive at a fair ruling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur mustert Abelard von Kopf bis Fuß und antwortet dann mit einem leisen Hauch von Skepsis in der Stimme.{/n} "Gewisse Beweise deuten auf sie hin, Abelard ... {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} wird gewiss zu einem gerechten Urteil kommen."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Vali, bakışlarıyla Abelard'ı süzüp bir nebze şüpheyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Abelard, elimizde kanıt var... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, şüphesiz ki adil bir karara varacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor sweeps his gaze over Abelard, then replies, a faint shadow of a doubt in his voice:{/n} "We have evidence implicating them, Abelard... I am sure that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will arrive at a fair ruling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, bakışlarıyla Abelard'ı süzüp bir nebze şüpheyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Abelard, elimizde kanıt var... Şüphesiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri adil bir karara varacaktır."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
